itemSettings.name: Item Settings
itemSettings.description: You can change the size of the item in your hand.

negateItemXInOffhand.name: Negate Item X in Offhand
negateItemXInOffhand.description: If enabled, the item X will be negated in the offhand.

handSettings.name: Hand Settings
handSettings.description: You can change the size of your hand.

swingSettings.name: Swing Animation Settings
swingSettings.description: You can change the swing animation speed.
